media.title: The Branding Iron (1920) - Barbara Castleton.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film The Branding Iron (1920) with Barbara Castleton, from an article on film censorship on page 40 of the October 1922 Photoplay. The caption noted that this scene had been cut in Pennsylvania because of its nudity, but then that state board banned the entire film because it dealt with the topic of infidelity.
media.attribution: Reginald Barker Productions / Goldwyn Pictures Corporation
